name: STICK TO THE EDGE
description:
you are the boss, your minion will copy your every move. you have to get to the door, with the help of sticky edges of the platform.

made in one day so didn't got enough time for playtesting. so bugs = yeah.

also don't try to finish last level, I made it in hurry so it's difficulty level = EXTREME 

Let me know in comments if any epic gamer actually finished THE LAST LEVEL. 

Controls-

left-right arrow keys to move

spacebar to jump

double jump enabled
